Sense | Multiple Positions | Cambridge, MA | Onsite, Full-time | https://sense.com/careers.html

* Are you a computer nerd who wants to help fix climate change?

* Want to work on a consumer product which customers love?

Residential energy use is roughly a third of the global warming problem, and is a multi-trillion dollar market. Yet it's nearly impossible for most homeowners to measure. And you can't change what you can't measure. That's why Sense exists. With our product, users get a live, device-by-device breakdown of your home's activity and energy usage. Want to know why your energy bill is so high? We can tell you. Want to know whether you left the garage door open? Our product can tell you.

Users love our product, we're growing quickly, and we're and have openings all over the stack.
